## What we shared
- Stripe rust nurseries and durability comparisons
- Low-input plant architecture lines
- Nutrition-focused wheat lines
- UAV-based phenotyping demonstrations

## Why it matters
These efforts support yield and quality stability in real-world California fields
while reducing reliance on water and fertilizer.
